1.content:
"Come on, do it!" were the fateful words that Tom's friend, Kevin said to him. "I dare you to wear this diaper for the rest of the time at my house."

Not wanting to back down, you put it on. "Ok, but when my mom calls to pick me up, I'm putting back on my underwear." You and Kevin always shared dares and never backed down.

Unfortunately for you (Tom), your mom's cell phone ran out of battery so she didn't call but just showed up, early at that. You were quickly ushered into the car because your mom needed to get home early. During the car ride, your mom heard the diaper crinkling but said nothing because she wasn't sure what it was. When you got out of the car at your house, she could see the diaper riding out of the back of your pants.

"Tom, is that a diaper you are wearing?"

Stunned, you were hoping to get to your room unnoticed. "I can explain." you say

"No, I think you need to head up to your room so I can unpack the car and think about what is going on." Your mom says to you. "Leave your diaper on and Ill be up in a few minutes to help you."

You move quickly with you eyes looking back and forth hoping that you can get there without running into either of your sisters. You are the middle child with a sister who, Erin, is 16 (3 years older than you) and one, Megan, who is 10 (3 years younger).

Having safely navigated your way back to your room without being detected, you sit and wait patiently for your mom. You wonder what your mom is thinking and is she is going to punish you or just send you to the psych hospital for weirdos.

It takes about 10 minutes before your mom appears in your room. She is carrying a rather large bag.

"Well I found some of the stuff that we need but I am going to have to go to the store later and find a few other things. Luckily I still had some of the things from when your baby cousin (she was 4 but still wore diapers at night) stayed with us for a while last year." Mom unzips the bag and they were full of diapers, powders, etc.

"Mom! What are those things?" you shriek. " I don't need....."

"Hush." responds your mother. "I understand that you are interested in diapers, baby stuff..."

"Mom, I'm not. It was just..."

"I said hush. Another outburst like that and I am going to remind of something else that happens to young boys, a bare-bottom spanking!"

That got your attention and though you had not gotten one in at least a year, you knew that your parents were not afraid of putting their children over their knees. You decide to shut up and listen to your mother.

"Well, I must admit it was a surprise to see my 13 year old 8th grader wearing a diaper. I don't know if you do this often or not, I don't really care. What I do know is that I don't want you doing this later in life unless you really like it. The only way I can see to help you out is to make you wear a diaper for the next month."

Your parents were the type of people who, if they caught you smoking would make you smoke the whole pack so you would hate smoking and not want to do it again on your own.

You were in complete shock. A whole month?

"I know it sounds like a long time and some type of punishment but really it is in your own long-term interest. Now I am going to spell out the rules and you need to follow them or your are going to be in deep trouble, understand?"

When mom says "deep trouble", you listen and don't cross her.

Gulping, you say "yes".

"Ok, here are the rules. For this month, you are only allowed to wear diapers and must wear one at all times or wear nothing at all. But you are not allowed to use the toilet at all. So, for instance, if we were going swimming and I forgot swim diapers then you could go swimming naked like babies do. However, if you needed to go the bathroom we would put a diaper on your first so you could go. Understand?"

You nod your head yes.

"You are not allowed to change your own diaper. Babies can't do that so someone else must do it for you."

"What about school?" you ask. "I can't wear one at school and I can't hold it all day."

"Hmm, well, I remember that there was a girl two years ago that had to wear one for a while, and no, I'm not going to tell you who it was. She had the school nurse change her and nobody was the wiser. Ill have a chat with her and get it all set up. But you are right that this does pose some practical problems. Your father will be away on business for most of the month and I don't get home until 6 at the earliest so what are going to do from the time when school ends to when I get home. It wouldn't be fair to make you hold it. Luckily you are between sports seasons so we don't have to contend with that during the week. Hmm, what to do?"

"You could just let me use the toilet or let me change myself during that time." you suggest hoping to mitigate some of the damage to you.

"No, that wouldn't help teach you. I could ask Mrs. Williams down the street but that seems like an imposition. Maybe we will just need to get a babysitter. Someone to watch that you follow the rules and change you. I believe Susan's daughters have done some babysitting and certainly they have changed some diapers so maybe they could do it."

"Mom! No way!" you scream.

"Excuse me? I don't like that voice at all. Would you like to say something constructive or would you like to go over my knee?"

"Sorry."

"I know Bridget has babysat a number of years and Cindy I believe has done some too."

"Mom? Bridget is only a year older than I am and well Cindy is actually a year below me."

"That really shouldn't be a concern of yours. You are the one who is wearing the diaper of a 3 year old. Plus both those girls are very mature for their age. I know that they help with Jenny (their 9 year old sister)."

"Geez, mom." you say sarcastically "at that point why don't you just have Erin or Megan do it? haha."

"That's a good point. Why pay for babysitting when I can get it for free?"

'Sh*t' you think to yourself. 'I should have kept my mouth shut.'

"But they have activities 3 days a week after school so I guess they can handle 2 days and Ill see if Susan's girls can cover the other 2. I'm sure the money will come in handy for them."

You can't believe how your life has changed just because your buddy dared you to try on a diaper. 'Well first he diapered me and now it is going to be others. This is so humiliating. '

"Now that we have the ground rules set, do we need to get that diaper off of you and get you a fresh one. This one might be a little small so we can go get you some ones more your size in a bit. I will have to change you on your bed until we bring up the changing table from the basement. We will just have to decide where to put it"

What happens now?
1.title: How it happened

After a bit of time, Tom headed on out of his room and down to the kitchen. He was glad that he hadn't seen either of his sisters home yet. Feeling the diapers under his pants felt weird to Tom and he was sure he could hear every movement when he walked.

Tom came into the kitchen and saw his mom on the telephone.

Tom could hear only one side of the conversation but knew enough that his mom was talking to her friend about getting her girls to babysit him.

"Well, no I don't mind. You all are doing us a favor. And the girls have changed diapers before so they know what to do?....Great...Haha...actually, it hasn't really matured yet so it shouldn't be a big deal. Yea, kind of still looks like a baby's. Great, well we will see her after school tomorrow. Tell them to come over and to just come inside. The door is unlocked. Ill talk them through it. Bye."

Mom hung up the phone. "The girls can do it. Bridget or Cindy will come over and watch you after school depending on the day. They may have to bring Jenny along some days depending on the schedule."

Tom was soooo embarrassed. He face was red again. He chatted with his mother a little bit and then heard the door slam closed.

"We're in the kitchen." Karen said.

13221.content:
Just then, Erin, Tom's older sister, entered the room.

Erin had just returned from driving her boyfriend home after their respective sport's practice. She had recently got her driver's license and was occasionally allowed to drive to school, if it was helpful to her mom. This being Wednesday, she would have gotten home way too late to supervise Tom which necessitates the babysitting of Bridget and Cindy on these days.

Erin and Karen chatted a bit about her day until Karen dropped the news on Erin.

"Honey, I am going to need you to help out after school on at least one day a week. This will mean taking care of someone after school until I get home." Tom's face turned red hearing the conversation but he sat their quietly.

"Oh mom, seriously? What days do I have to do it? How old is the kid? Do I have to change diapers?"

"Well, you and your sister have to cover Tuesday and Thursday. You can work it out with her who gets what day. And yes, you will have to change diapers. You have done it before so I am sure it won't be a bid deal with you."

"Ok, well this kid better not get out of line like some of the others I have babysat. I have really wanted to wallop their bottoms sometimes. You know, just like you and dad used to have to do."

"Still do or will do, honey. But to answer your question, you or your sister have parental control during this time so if the child gets out of hand you certainly have the right to punish him. If it comes to giving a spanking, well, use your best judgment."

Tom was dumbfounded. He couldn't believe that his sisters were not only going to change his diaper but also had the right to spank him.

"Ok, well if you are sure his mother is ok with it. Who is it anyway?"

"I am ok with it and it is Tom." Erin's eyes grew wide and she turned her eyes onto Tom. He quickly tried to hide his shame by looking at the floor.

"Are you serious?" Erin questioned looking back at her mother and starting to giggle.

Karen took some time to explain the situation to her and she agreed that she would do Thursdays.

Listening to the conversation, Tom had that bloated feeling in his belly. He held it for as long as he could until finally releasing his pee into the diaper. The diaper was for younger kids but luckily for Tom he hadn't peed too much so the diaper was able to hold it.

Tom's face looked ashamed. Karen looked over at Tom and immediately knew what was happening.

"I think someone has filled their diaper." she said to Erin. "Is that right, Tom?"

Tom hung his head, unable to face his mom or older sister. He just nodded his head.

"Pee or poop?" she questioned.

Tom was unable to answer. Karen walked around the counter to the other side of the breakfast bar where Tom was standing and leaning onto the bar. She matter of factly pulled open the back part of his jeans and looked in his diaper, just like she would with a toddler who couldn't speak.

Karen looked up Erin and said, "Well there is no poop so it is just pee. We have enough for one more change upstairs. Do you want to change him or do you want to go get more diapers and wipes while Ill change him?"

Who changes Tom while the other goes to the store?

13223.content:
Just the Bridget & Cindy entered the room. Tom was surprised to see them and grew red faced as soon as he remember why they were there.

They said hello to Karen and Tom and were very polite. Obviously Susan had told them to be on their very best behavior and not to laugh.

Bridget was a freshman and a year older than Tom. She had developed quite nicely with solid B-cups (almost C) and very small hips. She had short brown hair. Cindy was 12 and a grade below Tom in 7th grade so they were at the same middle school. Cindy had just started to grow boobs and they were stretching a bit through her t-shirt which was a bit too tight for her. Cindy had sandy blonde hair that was shoulder length.

Karen made a little bit of small talk with the girls and then started "I appreciate you girls helping us out."

"Of course." Bridget said, speaking for her sister also. "Our mom told us that we would be babysitting after school three days a week, so that is cool."

"Great." Karen replied.

"Mom said it wasn't an infant but that we would need to change diapers. We have both have experience with that." Bridget said, sort of as if it was a job interview.

Tom was listening and it was starting to dawn upon him that they didn't know who they were babysitting.

"I'm glad to hear that. I wasn't sure if you had, Cindy." said Karen.

info.brief_description: Teen must wear diapers for a month and is not allowed to change himself.
info.description:
Tom, a 13 year old, is caught by his mother wearing a diaper (which he did as a dare). His mother decides the best way to break him of this habit, is to have him stay in diapers for a month. He is not a allowed to change them himself.

He gets changed by his mother, his babysitters, his sisters and others.

Karen - his 39 year old mother
Erin - his 16 year old sister
Megan - his 10 year old sister

Susan - Karen - 41 year old friend
Bridget - 14 year old daughter and babysitter
Cindy - 12 year old daughter and babysitter
Jenny - 9 year old daughter

Ken - 14 year old friend of Tom's

Mrs. Williams - 54 year old neighbor

Feel free to add other characters
In general, he never likes his diaper nor does he enjoy getting changed.
No short chapters please.
Be descriptive!
info.pretty_title: A Month in Diapers and other humiliation
